name: TX Yard Games Website
description: Application inspired by Houston Lawn Games - https://www.houstonlawngames.com/. The website offers resources for game enthusiasts, including game rules, equipment rentals, and event listings, making it a one-stop hub for anyone looking to enjoy outdoor gaming experiences in Houston. This service will be using to view, create, edit, and delete a user.

name: TX Yard Games Server
description: This Server will handle operation for TX Yard Games Website including but not limited to using to view, create, edit, and delete a user.
